meanings.sent1: The smell of fresh bread pervades the kitchen.

meanings.definition: To be present and apparent throughout
meanings.sent1: An air of excitement pervades the stadium before the big game.
meanings.sent2: A feeling of anticipation pervades the room as they wait for the surprise.
meanings.sent3: The aroma of freshly baked cookies pervades the house, tempting everyone to the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The spirit of unity pervades the team, driving them to work together towards victory.
meanings.sent5: A sense of wonder pervades the forest, as if each tree holds a secret waiting to be discovered.
